caption:
This photograph captures a landscape heavily influenced by deforestation or fire, showing a stark and somewhat desolate scene. The foreground is dominated by the charred remains of several large, fallen tree logs. These logs are burned to varying degrees and scattered across a rugged terrain consisting of ash, debris, and small rocks.

The terrain slopes upwards from the foreground towards a hill in the background. Sparse vegetation can be seen in the distance, incorporating a few standing, yet thin, trees that look like they have survived some form of environmental distress. The sky is clear and vibrant, contributing a stark contrast to the dark ground covered with remains of the forest.

The overall composition conveys a sense of recent destruction or recovery from a catastrophic event such as a wildfire, with the focus on the burned logs making a powerful statement about the impact of such events on natural environments. The image evokes a somber reflection on environmental degradation and resilience.
title: Clear cutting
